title: Alan Brochstein On Cannabis Investing In 2022
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Cannabis industry expert Alan Brochstein on the current state of cannabis and 2022 catalysts. New York and New Jersey's path to legalization, how to look at consolidation. Direct listings and SPACs, cannabis REITs, Curaleaf and Verano. MedMen/Ascend Wellness deal breakdown unsurprising.
